title: what do you do when you have a useless teammate in ranked??
body:
and i dont mean someone who just feeds all game, no quite the opposite im talking about the guys you sometimes get that have scores like 1/3/2 in a 30-40 minute game..they dont speak at all, they dont help and they run around doing absolutely nothing all game and they might as well be afk. These players i think could legit be brain dead but that's impossible because they're playing the game so im just like
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} 

i just dont understand people like this, and you cant even report them because technically they're doing nothing wrong.
what do i do when i get these people on my team is it just an auto loss or what???
